text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Public water system" has the meaning stated in § 9-401 of this article and is a water system located in the State.
"Expanded water appropriation permit" means a revised permit granting a significant increase in the withdrawal of water authorized under the existing water appropriation permit.

"Water conservation" means the use of practices, techniques, and technologies that:
Reduce the consumption, loss, or waste of water;
Improve efficiency in the use of water; or
Make more efficient use of water treatment infrastructure.
